title: Piercing Strike
content:
iercing Strike is an Action in Baldur's Gate 3. Actions can be used in both exploration and combat to maneuver across the battlefield or to harm or aid Characters. The actions that a Character can perform are based on their Class and Equipment.

Piercing Strike Information

Deal regular damage and possibly inflict Gaping Wounds which cause extra damage on attacks. Undead and Constructs can't receive Gaping Wounds. 1d4+7Piercing 2 turns Type: Action Melee CON Save Attack Roll Short Rest Range: 1.
